intro: Ultramarines Legion armies gain 12 formation points (F/p), 12 upgrade points (U/p), 4 Titan points (T/p), and 6 Ally points (A/p) for a normal sized battle. A negative U/p value means that you gain that many upgrade points for taking a particular formation.
strategy: Legiones Astartes armies have a Strategy Rating of 4.
Initiative: All Legiones Astartes Detachments and Collegia Titanica allied Banners have an initiative of 1+. Legiones Cybernetica Batteries have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Machine Spirit' special rule. Solar Auxilia allied Tercios have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Army of Mankind' special rule. Questoris Familia allied Lances have an initiative of 2+ and are subject to the 'Chivalry' special rule.
armyRules: The Dauntless special rule applies to all Ultramarines Legion Detachments and Collegia Titanica Banners.

sections.name: Ultramarines Core Detachments
sections.description: Must have at least one Tactical or Mechanized Tactical Detachment

formations.name: Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Supreme Commander (0-1 in the army, 0 U/p)
Add up to two Tactical Legionaries, Support Legionaries, and/or Heavy Support Legionaries: 1 U/p each
Add two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any single configuration (2 U/p) or two Cataphractii Terminators (3 U/p)

formations.name: Mechanized Tactical Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Tactical Legionaries, two Rhinos
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p), or with a Supreme Commander (0-1 in the army, 0 U/p)
Add up to two Assault Legionaries: 1 U/p each
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with four Support Rhino - Melta, four Support Rhino - Missile Launcher, or two of each: 2 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Land Raider Proteus: 3 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with one Spartan of any configuration: 3 U/p

formations.name: Support Detachment
formations.units: Two Support Legionaries, one Rhino
extraUnits: Replace Rhino with two Support Rhinos of any single configuration (1 U/p), one Contemptor Dreadnought (1 U/p), one Land Raider Proteus (2 U/p), or two Support Legionaries (2 U/p)

formations.name: Heavy Support Detachment
formations.units: Two Heavy Support Legionaries - Missile Launcher, one Rhino
extraUnits: Replace Rhino with two Support Rhinos of any single configuration (1 U/p), one Contemptor Dreadnought (1 U/p), one Land Raider Proteus (2 U/p), or two Heavy Support Legionaries (3 U/p)

formations.name: Contemptor Detachment
formations.units: Four Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any configuration
extraUnits: Add up to two Contemptor Dreadnoughts of any configuration: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Predator Detachment
formations.units: Three Predator Annihilator, and/or Predator Destructor
extraUnits: Add one Predator of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Sicarian Detachment
formations.units: Two Sicarian - Autocannon, Sicarian - Plasma, Sicarian Punisher, and/or Sicarian Arcus
extraUnits: Add up to one Sicarian of any configuration: 1 U/p

sections.name: Ultramarines Special Detachments
sections.description: May only have one Special Detachment for each two Core Detachments

formations.name: Rapier Detachment
formations.units: Four Legion Rapiers of any configuration

formations.name: Cybernetica Tarantula Battery
formations.units: Four Tarantula of any configuration

formations.name: Land Raider Detachment
formations.units: Two Land Raider Proteus
extraUnits: Add up to two Land Raider Proteus: 2 U/p each

formations.name: Assault Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Assault Legionaries
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian (1 U/p)
Add up to two Land Speeders of any configuration, or Attack Speeders, or Assault Legionaries: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Land Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Land Speeders of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Land Speeder of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Attack Speeder Detachment
formations.units: Three Attack Speeder
extraUnits: Add one Attack Speeder: 1 U/p

formations.name: Scimitar Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, three Scimitar Jetbikes
extraUnits: Add up to two Land Speeders or Attack Speeders of any configuration: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Outrider Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Legion Outriders
extraUnits: Add up to two Legion Outriders: 1 U/p each

sections.name: Ultramarines Elite Detachments
sections.description: May only have one Elite Detachment for each three Core Detachments

formations.name: Terminator Detachment
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, three Cataphractii Terminators
extraUnits: Replace the Lieutenant character with a Captain, Chaplain, or Librarian: 1 U/p
Add one Cataphractii Terminator, or replace three Cataphractii Terminators with Fulmentarus Terminators: 2 U/p

formations.name: Nemesis Destroyer Squad
formations.units: One Lieutenant character, four Nemesis Destroyer Squads
extraUnits: Add two Rhinos to the formation: Free
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with four Support Rhino - Melta, four Support Rhino - Missile Launcher, or two of each: 2 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with two Land Raider Proteus: 3 U/p
Replace two Rhinos in the formation with one Spartan of any configuration: 3 U/p

formations.name: Leviathan Detachment
formations.units: Three Leviathan Dreadnought of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Leviathan Dreadnoughts of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Deredeo Detachment
formations.units: Three Deredeo Dreadnought of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Deredeo Dreadnought of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Sabre Detachment
formations.units: Three Sabre - Autocannon, and/or Sabre - Neutron Blaster
extraUnits: Add up to three Sabres of any configuration: 1 U/p each

formations.name: Spartan Detachment
formations.units: Two Spartan - Lascannon and/or Spartan - Laser Destroyer

formations.name: Kratos Detachment
formations.units: Two Kratos - Battle Cannon and/or Kratos - Melta

formations.name: Fellblade Detachment
formations.units: One Fellblade Super-Heavy Tank

sections.name: Ultramarines Navy Detachments
sections.description: May only have one Navy Detachment for each three Core or Special Detachments

formations.name: Storm Eagle
formations.units: One Storm Eagle

formations.name: Thunderhawk Gunship
formations.units: One Thunderhawk of any configuration

formations.name: Fire Raptor
formations.units: One Fire Raptor of any configuration

formations.name: Xiphon Interceptor
formations.units: Two Xiphon Interceptors
extraUnits: Add one additional Xiphon Interceptor: 2 U/p

formations.name: Warhound
formations.units: One Warhound Scout Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 1 U/p

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Scout Titans (must have the same armament)
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon: 2 U/p

formations.name: Dire Wolf
formations.units: One Dire Wolf Heavy Scout Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Support Weapon with a Heavy Support Weapon (1 U/p)

formations.name: Reaver
formations.units: One Reaver Battle Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warlord
formations.units: One Warlord Battle Titan
extraUnits: Replace one Battle Weapon with a Support Weapon (1 U/p) or Heavy Support Weapon (2 U/p).

formations.name: Warmaster
formations.units: One Warmaster Heavy Battle Titan

sections.name: Solar Auxilia Allied Tercios
sections.description: The first formation selected must be an Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio

formations.name: Auxilia Lasrifle Tercio
formations.units: One Auxilia Command Squad, four Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, one Auxilia Flamer Squad
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or two Veletarii, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Ogryn Tercio
formations.units: Three Charonite Ogryns
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, or two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or two Veletarii: 1 U/p

formations.name: Veletarii Tercio
formations.units: Four Veletarii
extraUnits: Add two Auxilia Lasrifle Squads, two Auxilia Flamer Squads, or one Charonite Ogryns: 1 U/p

formations.name: Auxilia Heavy Sentinel Patrol
formations.units: Four Aethon Heavy Sentinels

formations.name: Auxilia Leman Russ Squadron
formations.units: Three Leman Russ of any configuration
extraUnits: Add one Leman Russ of any configuration: 1 U/p

formations.name: Armiger Lance
formations.units: Three Knight-Warglaives and/or Knight-Helverins

formations.name: Questoris Lance
formations.units: Two Questoris Knight-Paladins, Crusaders, Errants, Wardens or Gallants. May not mix configurations
extraUnits: Add one Questoris Rocket Pod to each Knight in the formation: 1 U/p
